mapper.select: SELECT p.`personnelid`,p.`personnelname`,p.`phone`,p.`email`,s.`staffid`,d.departname,p.`sex`,p.`post`,p.`physicalstate`,p.`height`,p.`card`,p.`address` ,p.`degree`,p.`birthplace`,p.`nation`,p.`schooltag`,p.`martial`,p.`compile`,p.`hiredate`,p.`applicable`,p.`borndate`,p.`startdate`,p.`enddate` FROM `personnel` p INNER JOIN staff s ON p.personnelid=s.personnelid INNER JOIN `department` d ON p.remark1=d.departid

SELECT p.`personnelid`,p.`personnelname`,p.`phone`,p.`email`,s.`staffid`,d.departname,p.`sex`,p.`post`,p.`physicalstate`,p.`height`,p.`card`,p.`address` ,p.`degree`,p.`birthplace`,p.`nation`,p.`schooltag`,p.`martial`,p.`compile`,p.`hiredate`,p.`applicable`,p.`borndate`,p.`startdate`,p.`enddate` FROM `personnel` p INNER JOIN staff s ON p.personnelid=s.personnelid INNER JOIN `department` d ON p.remark1=d.departid WHERE p.personnelid=#{personnelid}
